org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels

Class DataLabelsOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels.AbstractBuilder<DataLabelsOptions>
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels.DataLabelsOptionsBuilder

  • public final class DataLabelsOptionsBuilder
extends AbstractBuilder<DataLabelsOptions>
    Comfortable object to create DataLabelsPlugin.ID plugin options by a builder.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
